attributes.action: Stop penalising couples with no children who are not on benefit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a married couple with no children who are self employed and trying to survive on £250 a week each and claiming no benefits we are feeling discriminated against with the rebates given to 'the needy' from overcharge of electricity, gas and proposed council tax. To be overcharged for the benefit of others is totally un-ethical and is fraud by any other name.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
